title: Karamo
overview: Karamo is a new daily, one-hour talk show starring reality television personality, author, actor, producer and activist Karamo Brown bringing his enthusiastic, charismatic and fresh voice to daytime TV. The show will take the best elements of daytime drama while utilizing his unique personal journey and innate ability of personal connection to authentically address a wide range of topics, including infidelity, race, parenting and complex family dynamics.
